mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.user_id, u.password, u.name, u.nickname, u.email, u.mobile, u.address, u.role, TO_CHAR(u.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDt, TO_CHAR(u.mod_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS modDt, i.save_name AS profileImage FROM user_tk u LEFT JOIN image i ON i.table_name = 'user' AND i.target_no = u.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT tt3.RNUM AS no, tt3.user_no, tt3.user_id, tt3.password, tt3.name, tt3.nickname, tt3.email, tt3.mobile, tt3.address, tt3.role, TO_CHAR(tt3.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_dt, TO_CHAR(tt3.mod_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mod_dt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, tt2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.* FROM user_tk t1
ORDER BY t1.reg_date DESC ) tt2
WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize}) ) tt3 WHERE RNUM >= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1) ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM user_tk
) B
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tk ( user_no, user_id, password, name, nickname, email, mobile, address, role, reg_date, mod_date ) SELECT user_no_seq.NEXTVAL AS user_no, 'jamesol' || level AS user_id, '4321_' || level AS password, '이상무' || level AS name, '닉네임' || level AS nickname, 'jamesol' || level || '@paran.com' AS email, '0101234' || LPAD(level, 4, '0') AS mobile, '서울시 강남구' || level AS address, DECODE(MOD(level, 2), 0, 'admin', 'user') AS role, SYSDATE - level AS reg_date, SYSDATE AS mod_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 502
mapper.update: UPDATE user_tk SET user_id = #{userId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, address = #{address}, role = #{role}, mod_date = SYSDATE WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
